tools.name: ols_mcp
tools.description: Access the OLS (Ontology Lookup Service) MCP API to retrieve ontology mappings, search for terms, get cross-products, and retrieve term information. Useful for ontology term translation, alignment, and metadata lookup.

term.description: The term or label to search for (required for 'mappings' and 'search' operations)

ontology.description: The ontology ID (e.g., 'go', 'chebi', 'efo', 'doid'). Required for 'mappings', 'cross_product', and 'term' operations.

iri.description: The IRI of the term (required for 'term' operation)

size.description: Maximum number of results to return (for 'search' and 'cross_product' operations)

exact.description: Whether to perform exact match (for 'search' operation)
